Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside to smoke and looked up at the brightest star only to notice odd circular motions and movements that were very fast and turns that were instantaneous. we observed to object and all agreed it was not a terrestrial craft as the movements it made were unlike those we have ever witnessed. the "craft" appeared to move like it was tethered to the ground which was impossible due to the height of the "craft". it circled the same area for an hour or so and then became obscured by cloud cover. google star maps showed no stars in the area and my cell phone camera was compromised by city lights. To this day i have never seen ANYTHING like it! VERY VERY strange!
trends: There have been no other sightings in binghampton
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: the object made no noise and appeared to be a staar until strange movements were observed. this was seen and confirmed by both my wife and mother.
